function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rising cases of fungal and viral resistances posing significant threats","Impact":"Increased mortality, limited treatment options","Mitigation":"Developing new antifungal and antiviral drugs, improving surveillance and monitoring","Technologies":"Advanced genetic sequencing, big data analytics for surveillance","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, public health authorities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, pharmaceutical companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Limitations in current infection disease surveillance techniques","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of disease prevalence, delayed detection of emerging diseases","Mitigation":"Improving sampling strategies, integrating epidemiological and population data","Technologies":"Advanced data analytics, AI for predictive modeling","People":"Public health authorities, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
